name: Luna's Hat
description:
## Luna's Hat

Unleash your culinary prowess with Luna's Hat, a whimsical accessory that enhances your cooking speed.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
